Home.Home0: Make your online presence a reality with us!
Home.Home1: We are a group of developer working at the intersection of design and technology.
Home.Home2: Success is not measured by wealth alone; it's also about personal growth and happiness.

Services.ServicesT: We help you identify, explore and respond to new opportunities.
Services.Services0: As long as those opportunities involve giving us money to re-purpose old projects — we can come up with an endless number of those.
Services.Services1: We specialize in creating beatufiul, high quality web and blockchain developments and pages.
Services.Services2: We have a team of experienced developers who can help you build your application.
Services.Services3: We are at the forefront of modern e-commerce development. Which mainly means adding your logo to the Shopify store template we’ve used for the past six years.
Services.Services4: We will manage your community on social media, building a strong brand.

Work.Work2: We believe in efficiency and maximizing our resources to provide our clients with the best solutions. The primary focus of our work is to provide our clients with the best solutions for their business.

Footer.Footer1: Subscribe to get the latest design news, articles, resources and inspiration.

Process.Process2: We believe in efficiency and maximizing our resources to prive the best value to our clients. The primary way we do that is by re-using our resources.
Process.Process4: We work closely with our clients to understand their needs-and goals, embedding ourselves in their every day operations to understand what makes their business tick.
Process.Process5: Our team of private investigators shadow the company director’s for several weeks while our account managers focus on going through their trash. Our senior security experts then perform social engineering hacks to gain access to their business accounts that information over to our forensic accounting team.
Process.Process6: Once the full audit is complete, we report back with a comprehensive plan and, more importantly, a budget.
Process.Process14: Based off of the discovery phase, we develop a comprehensive roadmap for each product and start working towards delivery. The roadmap is an intricately tangled mess of technical nonsense designed to drag the project out as long as possible.
Process.Process15: Each client is assigned a key account manager to keep lines of communication open and obscure the actual progress of the project. They act as a buffer between the client’s incessant nagging and the development team who are hard at work scouring open source projects for code to re-purpose.
Process.Process16: Our account managers are trained to only reply to client emails after 9pm, several days after the initial email. This reinforces the general aura that we are very busy and dissuades clients from asking for changes.
Process.Process17: Clodron will build your project from the ground up.
Process.Process20: About halfway through the Build phase, we push each project out by 6 weeks due to a change in requirements. This allows us to increase the budget a final time before launch.
Process.Process21: Despite largely using pre-built components, most of the progress on each project takes place in the final 24 hours. The development time allocated to each client is actually spent making augmented reality demos that go viral on X.
Process.Process22: We ensure that the main pages of the site are fully functional at launch — the auxiliary pages will, of course, be lorem ipusm shells which get updated as part of our exorbitant maintenance retainer.
Process.Process25: Our projects always have 100% test coverage, which would be impressive if our tests weren’t as porous as a sieve.
Process.Process27: To ensure reliability we only use the best Digital Ocean droplets that $4 a month can buy.
Process.Process29: Because we hold the API keys for every critical service your business uses, you can expect a lifetime of support, and invoices, from us.
Process.Process32: We strive to stay at the forefront of emerging trends and technologies, while completely ignoring them and forking that old Rails project we feel comfortable using. We stand by our core values to justify that decision.
Process.Process34: The first part of any partnership is getting our designer to put your logo in our template. The second step is getting them to do the colors.
Process.Process36: We pride ourselves on never missing a deadline which is easy because most of the work was done years ago.
Process.Process38: Every business has unique needs and our greatest challenge is shoe-horning those needs into something we already built.
Process.Process40: We are transparent about all of our processes, banking on the simple fact our clients never actually read anything.
Process.Process42: We foster long-term relationships with our clients that go beyond just delivering a product, allowing us to invoice them for decades.
Process.Process44: The technological landscape is always evolving and so are we. We are constantly on the lookout for new open source projects to clone.

About.About2: We believe that our strength lies in our collaborative approach, which puts our clients at the center of everything we do.
About.About3: Clodron was started by a group of friends who noticed that developer agencies were charging clients double what an in-house team would cost. Since the beginning, we have been committed to doing things differently by charging triple instead.
About.About4: At Clodron, we’re more than just colleagues — we’re a family. This means we pay very little and expect people to work late. We want our employees to bring their whole selves to work. In return, we just ask that they keep themselves there until at least 6:30pm.

Culture.Culture1: Balance your passion with your passion for life.
Culture.Culture2: We are a group of like-minded people who share the same core values.
Culture.Culture4: Our team has been with us since the beginning because none of them are allowed to have LinkedIn profiles.
Culture.Culture6: We don’t care when our team works just as long as they are working every waking second.
Culture.Culture8: You never know what someone is going through at home and we make sure to never find out.

Contact.Contact2: We can not wait to hear from you.
Contact.Contact4: Prefer doing things in person? We would love to see you!
